text: sæbævinma allah israil daruvangen pratignavak gatteya. tavada ovun aturin bharakaruvan dolos denek api evvemu. numbala salataya vidhimat va itu kara zakataya da pirinama mage rasulvarunva visvasa kota ovunata upakara kara tavada alamkara ayurin allahta naya laba dunne nam sæbævinma mama numbala samangaya. numbalage papayan numbalagen mama paha karami. yatin gamgavan gala basna svarga uyan valata numbala va ætulat karami yæyi allah pævasuveya. min pasuva numbala aturin kavareku pratiksepa kale da sæbævinma ohu niværadi margayen mula viya
